author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I BLO GSAL,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS GSER TOG RIN PO CHES SGRUB THABS RIN BYUNG GI RJES GNANG STZAL BA'I TSE, MA CHAG PA'I DAM BCA' CAN GYI SNGAGS MANG PO YOD PAS RIGS BSDUS KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR 'KHYER BDE BRIS ZHES @003B BKA'I ME TOG SPYI BOR STZAL BA LA, BKA' BZHIN SGRUB PA'I MCHOD PA DANG, SPUN GROGS 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PAR RE NAS, RJE 'DI NYID KYI BKA' DRIN GYIS NYE BAR 'TSO BA SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I BLO GSAL GYIS LUMBA'I TSAL MCHOG SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU BGYIS PA DZA YANTU,, ,,)
